message.content:
cs.SD, cs.SI, cs.SD.SI, cs.SD.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses signal processing techniques for speech enhancement and source separation, which are typically studied in the signal processing (cs.SD) and machine learning (cs.LG) communities. The paper proposes a modification to the signal-to-distortion ratio (SDR) measure commonly used in these fields, which could be of interest to researchers in the sub-categories of source separation and blind source separation (cs.SD.SI) and matrix factorization (cs.SD.MM).
